targets.expr: sum(prometheus_build_info{cluster=~"$cluster"}) by (container,version,goversion,pod,namespace) or sum(alertmanager_build_info{cluster=~"$cluster"}) by (container,version,goversion,pod,namespace) or sum(grafana_build_info{cluster=~"$cluster"}) by (container,version,goversion,pod,namespace) or sum(prometheus_operator_build_info{cluster=~"$cluster"}) by (container,version,goversion,pod,namespace) or sum(node_exporter_build_info{cluster=~"$cluster"}) by (container,version,goversion,namespace)

panels.description: No. of notifications sent in specified time range.
panels.title: Total Notification Sent [Time Range]

panels.description:
Connection between Prometheus and Alertmanager.

Active == (üëç)

Down  == (üëé)
panels.title: Prometheus <--> Alertmanager

panels.description: Prometheus - Number of times rule evaluation failed in last 5m.
panels.title: Rule evaluation failures [5m]

panels.description: Alertmanager - Failed email notifications in last 24h.
panels.title: Failed notification [24h]

panels.description: Total targets from which Prometheus is scraping metrics.
panels.title: Targets - Total

panels.description: Targets which are up and actively monitored.
panels.title: Targets - Up

panels.description:
Prometheus - no. of notifications currently in queue.

Higher queue length == Higher notification latency (Not Good)
panels.title: Queue length

panels.description: All active alerts detected by monitoring system.
panels.title: Total

panels.description: All alerts for which notification has been already sent or will be sent in next few seconds.
panels.title: Firing

panels.description: All alerts which are active but still in evaluation state.
panels.title: Pending

panels.description: All alerts with severity == Critical. These alerts have high priority and require quick response.
panels.title: Critical

panels.description: All alerts with severity == Warning. Such alerts detect issues in their early stages and sometimes only for information purpose.
panels.title: Warning

panels.description: All alerts with severity == Info. Such alerts are only for information purpose and generally dont require any manual intervention
panels.title: Info

panels.description: All active alerts for which notification has been disabled by someone manually. May be for maintenance purposes.
panels.title: Silenced
